text: Tomás Felipe Carlovich (20 April 1949 – 8 May 2020) was an Argentine professional football player and coach. He was born in Rosario, Argentina. As a player, he played for Rosario Central, Central Córdoba and Independiente Rivadavia. As a coach, he managed Central Córdoba.La palabra de Tomás Carlovich, Charrúa a Full website, February 17, 2011 On 6 May 2020, Carlovich was beaten with a shovel by a robber in Rosario while riding his bike. He died two days later in a coma at a hospital from his injuries, aged 71. ==References== Category:1949 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths by beating Category:Deaths from cerebral hemorrhage Category:Murdered sportspeople Category:Argentine footballers Category:People from Rosario, Argentina
title: Tomás Carlovich
